objects.text:
• Perfectly Matched Pink Set
• Sleek Compact With Mirror
• Creamy Lipstick Formula
• Long-Lasting Color

product_details.name: Pink Perfect Duo: Luxe Blush & Lipstick Set
product_details.description:
• Perfectly matched pink blush and lipstick combination for a coordinated look
• Sleek black compact with built-in mirror for on-the-go touch-ups
• Silky-smooth powder blush formula for natural-looking flush
• Creamy pink lipstick in metallic silver tube for elegant application
• Long-lasting color that stays vibrant throughout the day
• Professional-grade makeup essentials for your beauty arsenal
• Mirror-equipped compact for precise application anywhere
• Classic pink shade suitable for all skin tones
• Premium packaging with modern matte black finish
• Perfect gift set for makeup enthusiasts

banner_details:
This vibrant promotional banner is divided into four quadrants with alternating shades of pink and subtle linear diagonals crossing in the background. The upper-left quadrant presents a light pink background with a translucent pink circle overlay, emphasizing a bold heading text layer (`heading`) in black, followed by a sleek pink subheading (`subheading`). The lower-left quadrant highlights key product features using a white text layer (`description`). Beneath it is the price (`price`) in bold black and a rounded button background (`cta_background`) holding a white call-to-action text (`cta`). The bottom-right quadrant contains the promotional tagline (`tagline`) in dark bold text. A product image (`product_image`) of a pink-themed compact and lipstick set is placed prominently in the upper-right. Decorative dots and soft circular accents are scattered subtly for added flair.

**Color Palette:**
- #FFEBF4 (Very Light Pink)
- #F06292 (Medium Pink)
- #FF80B0 (Bright Pink)
- #333333 (Dark Charcoal)
- #FFFFFF (White)
product_color: The product image showcases a makeup set featuring a pink lipstick and compact blush with a mirror. The color palette centers around soft pinks and neutral tones. The primary highlight is the vibrant candy pink (#EC6BAF) seen in both the lipstick and blush, giving the product a feminine and youthful vibe. The compact casing and lipstick tube integrate sleek black (#1C1C1C) and metallic silver (#C0C0C0), adding sophistication and contrast. The colors are well-balanced with reflective and matte finishes, making the pink pop against the darker and neutral elements. This palette works beautifully for a fresh, elegant advertisement design.
